title: Web service derivatives.
abstract: In order to achieve the spectral data of common tree species and the sharing of spectral matching algorithms,this paper provides architecture based on the combination of the C/S and Web Services Web services;designs the spectral database based on the XML format storing;achieves the tree spectral reflectance spectra curve and the first derivative spectra curve drawing;achieves the choice of the optimal sensor band;achieves the spectrum curve matching algorithm of the spectral angle matching(SAM)、gray correlation analysis、Correlation coefficient、graph of Harmonic curve,etc;and achieves the web services sharing of the spectral data and the spectral matching algorithms.This system provides the basis which in order to achieve the continuous sharing for the interpret of the common tree species quantitative、spectral data and spectral matching algorithms through internet.
